career.name: Meta
career.title: Data Analyst (Contract via Tundra)
description: Led end to end labeling and audit workstreams that improved annotation accuracy by about 15% and directly strengthened AI model reliability for global user facing products.
Strengthened quality operations by analyzing error patterns, producing actionable insights and driving workflow changes that cut repeat labeling issues by an estimated 20%.
Resolved cross team operational blockers by coordinating with engineering, policy and vendor partners which reduced turnaround times for tooling fixes and guideline updates by roughly 30%.

Enhanced LLaMA and Business Messaging AI performance by designing evaluation rubrics, building targeted prompt tests and validating datasets which helped raise model alignment and response quality across multiple regions.

career.name: ING Bank
career.title: PEGA Engineer
description: Accelerated production issue resolution by designing and implementing a custom PEGA DX API application, reducing response time by 90% and improving system reliability.
Automated over 200 regression tests using Playwright and Selenium, reducing production defects by 35% and enhancing software quality.
Managed deployments across development, staging, and production environments using Microsoft Azure, ensuring seamless releases every sprint with 100% uptime.
Optimized system performance through API integrations and workflow enhancements, improving operational efficiency by 20% and reducing manual intervention in core banking processes.

Redesigned client websites with responsive layouts and modern UI, reducing bounce rates by 18% and improving mobile user experience.
